termsTextPartStart: If you are creating a new account,
onboardingFirstSubTitle: Get ready to discover new ways to memorize English vocabulary and sentences effectively and quickly.
onboardingSecondSubTitle: Go through your English vocabulary and sentences with spaced repetition. MemoryMinder will help you organize and schedule review sessions for effective memorization.
onboardingThirdSubTitle: Start memorizing your English words and sentences today! Use MemoryMinder to create a personalized plan and progress each day as you progress.
authMethodSubTitle: Please select your preferred method to continue setting up your account
signUpWithEmailSuggestTitle: Do you already have an account?
forgotPasswordSubTitle: Enter the email associated with your account.
notificationRequestSubTitle: Don't miss important messages like check-in details and account activity.
